00074 #ifndef __STGHTREE_H
00075 #define __STGHTREE_H
00076 
00077 #include <math.h>
00078 #include <arboretum/stCommon.h>
00079 #include <arboretum/stTypes.h>
00080 #include <arboretum/stMetricTree.h>
00081 #include <arboretum/stGHNode.h>
00082 
00083 
00103 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
00104 class stGHTree: public stMetricTree<ObjectType, EvaluatorType>{
00105 
00106    public:
00107 
00111       typedef struct GHTreeHeader{
00117          char Magic[4];
00118       
00122          stPageID Root;
00123 
00127          stCount Height;
00128 
00132          stCount ObjectCount;
00133 
00137          stSize NodeCount;
00138       } stGHTreeHeader;
00139 
00143       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00144 
00148       typedef EvaluatorType tMetricEvaluator;
00149 
00153       typedef stResult <ObjectType> tResult;
00154 
00160       stGHTree(stPageManager * pageman);
00161 
00165       virtual ~stGHTree(){     
00166          // Flus header page.
00167          FlushHeader();
00168       }//end ~stGHTree                                  
00169       
00170       #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00171 
00177          stPageID GetRoot(){
00178             return this->Header->Root;
00179          }//end GetRoot
00180       #endif //__stDEBUG__
00181 
00185       virtual stCount GetHeight(){
00186          return Header->Height;
00187       }//end GetHeight
00188 
00192       virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
00193          return Header->ObjectCount;
00194       }//end GetNumberOfObjects
00195 
00203       virtual bool Add(tObject * obj);
00204 
00215       tResult * RangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range);
00216 
00227       tResult * NearestQuery(tObject * sample, stCount k, bool tie = false);
00228 
00229    private:
00230 
00235       stPage * HeaderPage;
00236 
00240       stGHTreeHeader * Header;
00241 
00245       bool HeaderUpdate;
00246 
00247       #ifndef __stDEBUG__
00248 
00251          stPageID GetRoot(){
00252             return this->Header->Root;
00253          }//end GetRoot
00254       #endif // __stDEBUG__
00255 
00259       void SetRoot(stPageID root){
00260          Header->Root = root;
00261          HeaderUpdate = true;
00262       }//end SetRoot
00263 
00267       void LoadHeader();
00268 
00274       void DefaultHeader();
00275 
00279       void WriteHeader(){
00280          if (HeaderUpdate){
00281             myPageManager->WriteHeaderPage(HeaderPage);
00282             HeaderUpdate = false;
00283          }//end if
00284       }//end WriteHeader
00285 
00292       void FlushHeader(){
00293          if (HeaderPage != NULL){
00294             if (Header != NULL){
00295                WriteHeader();
00296             }//end if
00297             myPageManager->ReleasePage(HeaderPage);
00298          }//end if
00299       }//end FlushHeader
00300       
00304       stPage * NewPage(){
00305          Header->NodeCount++;
00306          return this->myPageManager->GetNewPage();
00307          HeaderUpdate = true;
00308       }//end NewPage
00309 
00313       void DisposePage(stPage * page){
00314          Header->NodeCount--;
00315          this->myPageManager->DisposePage(page);
00316          HeaderUpdate = true;
00317       }//end DisposePage
00318 
00329       void RangeQuery(stPageID pageID, tResult * result,
00330                       ObjectType * sample, stDistance range);
00331 
00342       void NearestQuery(stPageID pageID, tResult * result, ObjectType * sample,
00343                         stDistance & rangeK, stCount k);
00344 
00345 };//end stGHTree
